summary: Ditirambo is an atypical hero who never smiles, always tells the truth and carries out relentlessly as many missions entrust him. A writer's widow instructs him to locate her husband's ... See full summary »
cast: Gonzalo Suárez|Yelena Samarina|José María Prada|Charo López|Luis Ciges|Bill Dyckes|Ángel Carmona|Jaume Picas|Helenio Herrera|André Courrèges|Lou Bennett|Francesc Català Roca|Alberto Puig|María Luisa Pérez Espinosa|Tania Wilson|Jill Lator|Sylvie Couvignon|Margit Dreux|Linda Mestre|Sue Fischer|Anne Zoreff|Catherine Gocois
title: Ditirambo
